description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku mikurire y’umwana n’uburere?
title: Kuki ari ngombwa   kuganira no kungurana   ibitekerezo ku mikurire   y’umwana n’uburere?
content:
Imikurire y’umwana n’impinduka zigenda zimubaho zijyanye n’ubuzima bwo mu 
mubiri, mu bitekerezo n’ukuntu yitwara mu bandi bituma ashobora gukura no 
kwiga neza.

Imyaka itanu ya mbere y’umwana ni ingenzi, kuko ariyo fatizo ry’ ubuzima bwe 
bw’igihe kizaza. Niyo mpamvu imibereho ye myiza mu rugo, mu muryango, 
imikurire ye no kuba yashobora kwiga neza mu ishuri bigomba kwitabwaho muri 
iki kigero.

Ubushakashatsi mu bijyanye n’imikurire y’umwana, bwerekana ko imyaka itanu ya
mbere ite umwihariko ku mikurire y’ubwonko bw’umwana, itatu ibanza ikaba ari 
iyo kubuha isura nyayo. Ibyo umwana ahura na byo akiri muto ni byo biha 
ubwonko bwe umurongo w’ubuzima bwe bwose, bikaba byagira n’ingaruka ku 
myigire n’imyitwarire ye muri bagenzi be ndetse no mu muryango. 
Abana biga kandi bagafata vuba cyane iyo bakiri bato kuruta bakuze. Muri icyo 
gihe, bagomba kwitabwaho by’umwihariko, bagahabwa urukondo, umutekano, 
bakagirirwa isuku, bakanagaburirwa neza. Ibi bibaremamo icyizere, bagakura 
kandi bakiga neza kuko baba bate ubuzima bwiza.

Kumenya ibihe by’imikurire umwana anyuramo, bifasha ababyeyi gusobanukirwa 
impinduka zigenda zimubaba ho n’uko babimufashamo uko agenda akura.

Abana bose bate uburenganzira ku burere bwiza, gukurira mu muryango, 
kuvuzwa, kurya neza, kwiga, gukina, kurindwa ihohoterwa ndetse no gukurira 
ahantu habafasha gukoresha ubushobozi bate mu buzima bwabo. 

Ababyeyi, abarera abana, umuryango, Leta, imiryango yegamiye n’itegamiye kuri 
Leta, bate mu nshingano kubahiriza uburenganzira bw’umwana.
